author: PixelTracksAlpaka
body:
#### PR description:

This PR stems from #41117 and it's the 2nd of a series of smaller PRs.  

- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41282
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41284
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41285
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41286
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41287
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41288

This is It includes all the needed additions to `HeterogenousCore`. It creates a new sub-package `HeterogeneousCore/AlpakaUtilities` that includes all the needed utilities (such as histograms and vectors) for Alpaka mimicking what's done in `HeterogenousCore/CUDAUtilities`. It also adds some helpers in `HeterogeneousCore/AlpakaInterface/interface/workdivision.h` for range computation and looping.
 
This includes https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40932 and supersedes it with the latest comments received addressed.

Using https://github.com/PixelTracksAlpaka/cmssw/issues/15 as a log report to keep track of all the comments.

#### PR validation:

It compiles. Running base tests. No regression expected.
title: Pixel Alpaka Migration: `AlpakaInterface` Updates [II]
